sys_ui_message.message: As an Absa employee, you are eligible for a 30% discount on Microsoft Office 365 on up to 6 devices. This benefit has no time limit and you can continue using the software at its discounted price for as long as you are an Absa employee. To take advantage of this offer: 1. Go to [http://hup.microsoft.com/](http://hup.microsoft.com/) and enter your work email address 2. You will receive an email from Microsoft with a link. 3. Log in with your personal Microsoft Live account. And choose your preferred product. For complete details, [please read here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1471kdhxHny1EZ7ISMKH6PLrt3pDIbfjU/edit).
